features: 🪑【Pressure Relief】Our air-cushiony adopt high-temperature hot pressing and porous design to disperse the pressure of the seat body and accelerate air dredging. After the cushion is inflated, it increases the contact area of the buttocks and the air cushion, reduces the pressure on the buttocks, and distributes the pressure to the cushion.

🛌【Selected Fabric】 The purple seat cushion is made of flocking fabric, 2 times thicker than ordinary PVC fabric, comfortable and breathable, durable. Not easy to durty, stains only need to be wiped off with a damp cloth. The blue seat cushion is made of High-quality PVC fabric, comfortable and breathable, durable. Breathable and comfortable in summer, it is not easy to sweat, and it is not easy to harden in winter.
💨【Good Air-Tightness】 The transparent PVC air-filling hole and the air-filling bag adopt heat-sealing technology. After many pressure tests, the air-tightness is strong.

👩‍🦽【 Easy to Inflate or Deflate】Equipped with upgrade special pump, the diameter and length of the pump are larger than the others, the pump is more labor-saving than the others, Easy to use. Deflating is also easy, you can just pinch the mouth of the valve and squeeze the air cushion to let air out quickly and store away.

💺【Use Scene】 Wheelchair; office chair; car; travel; stadium. Can be used for seat cushions or backrests to enhance heat dissipation and ventilation and reduce the pressure on the hips and back.（🔔NOTE: In the event of an air leak, please contact us promptly and we will offer you a 100% refund or send you a new cushion, thank you. ）

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Kritoy Inflatable Seat Cushions？ Our seat cushion is made of flocking fabric, The flocking fabric is more comfortable and close to the skin, which is based on the PVS fabric and adds the flocking process, compared with PVC in color, it will look more high-end and durable.Our air-cushion wheelchairs are made of hypoallergenic hospital-grade materials and are the preferred seat cushion recommended by medical professionals. Adopt high-temperature hot pressing and porous design to disperse the pressure of the seat body and accelerate air dredging.Equipped with upgrade special pump, the diameter and length of the pump are larger than the others, the pump is more labor-saving than the others, Easy to use.

Good Air-Tightness The transparent PVC air-filling hole and the air-filling bag adopt heat-sealing technology. After many pressure tests, the air-tightness is strong. Easy to Carry After deflated, the seat pad can be easily put into a purse, briefcase or travel bag. Compact and lightweight, the inflatable seat cushion is extremely portable. Package Includes 1 x Inflatable seat cushion 1 x Upgrade Hand pump.

Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These cushions really helps with my mom who doesn't move around much. She sits for long periods of time and sometimes suffers from developing pressure sores, which can be a HUGE problem if they are neglected. These cushions provide relief and evening out of the pressure on the bottoms of who ever is sitting long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These cushions are very light weight. I had trouble blowing them up at first. The air valves wouldn't open enough to get air in. The little pumps that come with them are nearly useless. I finally ended up using my air compressor to force air in.Once inflated they only do a fair job of padding whatever you're sitting on. Maybe OK for kids or lighter adults but too light and flimsy for any heavy use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adjustable for comfort
reviews.reviewText: I have a couple of chairs that get uncomfortable if I sit too long. My experience with buying pillows has not been great because everything always ends up being too high when I get it, which throws my back and neck out of whack. I ordered this pair of inflatable pillows because I thought being able to regulate the height and stiffness might be a good thing.I filled one pillow for my desk chair with a small amount of air and another for a chair I watch TV in with more air. So far, the one that has the smaller amount of air is amazing and just what I've been looking for. The other one is OK but a tiny bit high.The pillows have a little plug where you insert the air. If I want to have less air, I could just leave this open and I imagine the one chair will adjust to be just right. The deflate-ability is also a nice feature for storing these pillows if you don't need them for a while.These pillows come with two air pumps, which is overkill for one person. However, if you were going to break down the set and leave one at work and when at home, it would be handy not to have to transport the air pump back and forth.This is my first experience with a refillable pillow. At first, it seemed like I was pumping and getting nowhere. Just when I was about ready to give up, the pillow magically filled with air. So, in addition to getting some pillows that will work well for me, I also got a show in the process too!I enthusiastically recommend these inflatable pillows.
